name: Developing the User Experience ASS2
description:
Please be sure to turn on the full screen button! Please be sure to turn on the full screen button!

The entire team developed a beta game, which is easy to control. Click the play button on the main page to start the game. To return to the main page, click Back in the upper left corner

You can manipulate the playback object by controlling the interactive buttons. Examples include moving left and right, rotating, changing size, and resetting the original position.

Please provide me with a beta evaluation!

This is the ASS2 job.

----Wenshi Liang 24014674
